description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Galactic Conquest is a old school RTS where you retake the galaxy from the evil Arachnid Empire. Specialize your planets and fight back with five different types of ships in fleet-style space combat. Or fight your friends in two-player online multiplayer space battles.
description.short: Galactic Conquest is a old school RTS where you retake the galaxy from the evil Arachnid Empire. Specialize your planets and fight back with five different types of ships in fleet-style space combat. Or fight your friends in two-player online multiplayer space battles.
